entry.tran: 未携带武器的；未武装的；徒手的
entry.def: If a person or vehicle is unarmed, they are not carrying any weapons.

example.ex: The soldiers concerned were unarmed at the time...
example.tran: 涉及其中的士兵当时并未携带武器。

example.ex: Thirteen unarmed civilians died in that attack.
example.tran: 13名手无寸铁的平民在那场袭击中丧生。

means.word_mean: 1. (used of persons or the military) not having or using arms;
2. used of plants or animals; without barbs or stings
